large tonsils.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

snores at night.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

gets up frequently at night.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

does not sleep well.context: She has very large tonsils and she snores at night and gets up frequently at night and does not sleep well.

rock in the right ear.context: There was a rock in the right ear and it was very deep in the canal, near the drum.

Hypertrophy of tonsils and adenoids.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Hypertrophy of tonsils and adenoids, and also foreign body of right ear.

foreign body of right ear.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Hypertrophy of tonsils and adenoids, and also foreign body of right ear.

Tonsillectomy.context: Operations: Tonsillectomy, adenoidectomy, and removal of foreign body (rock) from right ear.

adenoidectomy.context: Operations: Tonsillectomy, adenoidectomy, and removal of foreign body (rock) from right ear.

removal of foreign body (rock) from righ.context: Operations: Tonsillectomy, adenoidectomy, and removal of foreign body (rock) from right ear.

normal eardrum.context: I looked into the left ear under the microscope, took out a little wax and observed a normal eardrum.

impacted wax.context: On the right side, I took out some impacted wax and removed the rock with a large suction.

intact drum.context: The drum was intact with no evidence of middle ear fluid.

no evidence of middle ear fluid.context: The drum was intact with no evidence of middle ear fluid.

Afrin drops.context: Afrin drops were placed in both nostrils.

0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrin.context: Hemostasis achieved with electrocautery and the tonsils beds injected with 0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.

saline.context: The nose and throat were then irrigated with saline and suctioned.
